title: Homepage
description: I wanted a homepage for my PC that had everything I needed at a single glance, so I made one! I love the idea of customizable experiences for users, and tried to showcase that here. Make sure to click around and see everything this site has to offer!
features: Click to change between F° and C°
Clock changes between digital and analog
Switches from todo list to shopping list
Input bar at the top sets a focus for the day
All settings are saved in local storage

title: Steen's Beans
description: Gatsby is a new found love of mine. So much so that, this entire site is built and dynamically created using it! That in combination with a headless CMS and GraphQL, easily made Steen's Beans my favorite project to work on yet!
features: Universal layout that can be adapted to fit many needs
Pages are created dynamically for each coffee and roaster
Orders are calculated and emailed to the user
Backend data can be updated in real time
Data stored on backend CMS and displayed using GraphQL
